description: Craving your favourite meal but don't want to face the traffic or queues? Welcome to Thumo, Eswatini's home for fast, simple, and reliable food delivery. We connect you to the flavours you love, from the best local restaurants right to your doorstep.

developer: FAMOUS BRANDS MANAGEMENT COMPANY PTY LTD
description:
Order your favourite pizza faster with the official Debonairs Pizza app – now available in Eswatini!

Get the pizza you love, just the way you like it. With the Debonairs Pizza app, you can easily find your nearest restaurant, browse the full menu, customise your order, and pay – all from your phone.

Features:

Find a restaurant near you
Use location services to quickly locate your closest Debonairs Pizza.

Browse our full menu and promotions
Explore our latest pizzas, wraps, sides, and exclusive deals.

Customise your order
Add your favourite toppings and sauces to create the perfect meal.

Choose delivery or collection
Get your pizza delivered to your door or collect from your selected store.

Flexible payment options
Pay securely online, or choose cash or card on delivery.

Quick checkout with your account
Sign in to save your details and enjoy a faster checkout every time.

Easily reorder your favourites
View your recent orders and place them again with just a few taps.

Save your addresses
Store multiple delivery addresses for extra convenience.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

- Find nearby stores or search by area
- Filter stores by regular or Halaal Menus
- Filter stores by generator to ensure you’re not left hungry during load shedding
- Browse the Roman’s Pizza menu and its latest promotions and special offers
- Customise your order with extras and sauces

Download the Roman’s Pizza App and start ordering today

Mr D is Mzansi’s favourite convenience delivery service, here’s why:

• 11000+ restaurants/stores and over 300 Pick n Pay grocery stores all on one app
• 2600+ areas across South Africa
• Find favourites like KFC, McDonalds, Chicken Licken, Burger King, Nando’s, Spur, Simply Asia, Wimpy, Steers, RocoMamas, Roman’s Pizza, Kauai and Pick n Pay Liquor.
• Get Pick n Pay groceries at in-store prices delivered within an hour.
• Shop from a wide range of over 10,000 Pick n Pay products and earn Smart Shopper points.
• No nasty hidden fees at checkout.
• Pay with cash, card, eBucks or EFT. Simple and safe.
• Get daily deals and regular promotions from your favourite restaurants and Pick n Pay groceries.
• Get daily deals and regular promotions from restaurants, Pick n Pay groceries, TakealotNOW, and shops!
• Track every step of your order in real time.

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

We like our app the way we like our chicken: Fired up and all things PERi-PERi. Order your favourite Nando’s meals for delivery or collection. Not sure what to get? Tap ‘Surprise Me’ and treat your tastebuds to something different.

P.S. Opt-in for notifications to take advantage of free delivery, exclusive specials and fiery content.

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

ReciMe organizes all your favorite recipes in one place. Save recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, and Facebook. Create grocery lists and meal plans. Calculate calories for every recipe.

FEATURES

- Save Recipes from Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, Facebook – Download recipes from social media sites. The ingredients and method steps are saved in an easy-to-read format.
- Upload recipes from anywhere – Save your favorite recipes from your existing apps like Paprika, Notes app, Google Docs, Notion, Evernote, and more! Or add your own recipes.
- Grocery Lists – Create smart grocery lists to shop faster! Sort ingredients by supermarket aisle or by recipe.
- Meal Plan for the Week – Categorize meals for breakfast, lunch, or dinner.
- Nutrition Information – Calculate calories, protein, carbs, and fats for any recipe.
- Create Cookbooks – Organize your recipes into cookbooks. Customize recipes by meal type (breakfast, lunch, dinner), cuisine, diet, and more!
- Cloud Sync – All recipes are saved on the cloud.
- Access Across Multiple Devices – iOS and iPad.
- Adjust Ingredients – Scale ingredients to your desired serving size.
- Convert Measurements – Change recipe measurements between standard and metric.
- Cook with Ease – Keep your phone screen unlocked while you cook. Follow recipes step-by-step so you can focus in the kitchen.
- Share – Share recipes with your friends and family. Or send via email, SMS, WhatsApp, Messenger, or AirDrop.

OTHER FEATURES

- Add one photo to each recipe. Add multiple photos to every method step.
- Insert links to websites in each recipe.
- Add custom ingredients to your grocery list, or paste multiple ingredients.
- Share cookbooks with friends and family to follow your cooking journey.
- Rate recipes.
- Customize your profile – edit your bio and share links to your social media.

HOW DOES IT WORK?

ReciMe includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

The premium version allows you to:

1.	Download unlimited recipes from social media, and

2.	Upload unlimited private recipes to your private recipe collection.

You can start a 7-day free trial to access these premium features. Unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial, you will be automatically charged the price indicated on the payment screen for your chosen subscription period. The ReciMe Premium subscription renews automatically at the end of each period (each month or year) until you cancel. Canceling your subscription means the automatic renewal will be disabled. However, you will still have access to all your subscription features for the remaining time of your then-current period. Note that deleting the app does not cancel your subscriptions.

Terms of Use: https://www.recime.app/terms-and-conditions

Privacy Policy: https://www.recime.app/privacy-policy

Have an idea to make your cooking experience with ReciMe better? Please email us at hello@recime.app so we can help!

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Shop online & get your groceries delivered directly to your door in as fast as 1 hour. Plus, your first three grocery deliveries are free! And it's safe—contactless delivery is available.

Instacart delivers fresh food, drinks, and household items the same day in cities like Toronto, Vancouver, Kitchener, Ottawa, Mississauga, Brampton, London, and many more. Download the app to see what stores are available in your postal code.

Prefer to pickup? Order online and pickup at your local store, where it will be waiting for you when you arrive.

Ordering made easy
1. Enter your postal code
2. Shop stores for groceries, household items, electronics, and more
3. Add your items to your cart and place your order
4. Chat with your shopper in real time to make any changes to your order
5. Relax as while you wait for your delivery to arrive
6. Enjoy your items while you save time & money

Contactless delivery
Order safely from your home and get your groceries delivered to you same day. Our 100% contactless delivery helps to ensure you and your shopper stay safe.

Find your favourite products
Get fresh produce, late-night snacks, and drinks delivered to your door. Don’t forget essentials like toilet paper, other household items!

And your shopper will ensure that fragile items like eggs and glass bottles are always handled with care.

With Instacart, you can:
• Find exclusive deals & coupons
• Creating shopping lists
• Reorder your favourite products
• View nutritional information & filter by diet

Where to shop with Instacart
Shop from your favourite stores - City Market, Walmart, Costco, and nearly 40,000 other retail locations in North America.

Download to see what stores are available in your postal code.

Terms and conditions apply. See details: https://www.instacart.ca/help/section/360007996832

The Fodo diet offers a pre-selection feature for meals. Selections must be made at least 48 hours before delivery, or 72 hours if selecting for a Friday.
If no selection is made within the specified time, the system will automatically choose meals for the customer, and changes will not be permitted.
Please enable App notifications to receive reminders about meal selection.
 
Nutritionist Consultation
•	Nutritional consultations are available at the clinic for an additional fee.
•	Appointments must be booked in advance based on availability.
•	If the client is more than 20 minutes late, the company reserves the right to reschedule or cancel the appointment.
 
Meal Delivery
Meals are delivered daily in two time slots:
1.	The night before the scheduled meal day.
2.	The morning of the scheduled meal day.
Customers may request a change in their delivery slot, subject to availability.
Note: Delivery times may be affected by traffic conditions and congestion. The company is not responsible for delays caused by circumstances beyond its control.
Changing the Delivery Address: Changes can be made via the App but must be activated at least 48 hours before delivery.
Please enable App notifications to receive delivery updates.

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797

The Spur Africa app will reward you for every order you place. 

Every time you order a meal with Spur, you'll be earning cashback in Spur points,  which you can use to pay for your favourite meals. To earn points simply order on the app or scan your Spur bill. 

You can also order your favourite meal for delivery or collection, send gift vouchers, settle a bill by linking the app to your bank cards, locate your nearest restaurant and get app only special offers, vouchers and discounts.  

Do so much more with one app. 

The Spur Africa app allows you to: 
- Order your favourite Spur meal
- Purchase gift cards for your family and Friends
- Earn loyalty points off each order 
- Enjoy application only discounts and promotions
- Fined your favourite store and get your meals delivered to your door

Available in Zambia,Botswana, Zimbabwe & South Africa

Coming soon to Mauritus, Kenya, Nigeria

Download the app from the App Store, choose your location and we'll present you with personalised location-based Pizza Inn restaurant offerings.
 
We offer the ability to order food for delivery from Pizza Inn. 

Enjoy ordering your favourite pizza with the convenience of delivery.

Zulzi: Groceries in 15 Minutes

WE ARE Zulzi - your online supermarket. Order groceries via our app and in just 15 minutes we'll deliver your shopping right to your door. Fruit and vegetables, fresh food, chilled drinks, household items, and liquor at supermarket prices are delivered from 6:00 AM to 22:00 PM every day.

HOW IT WORKS:

1. Download the app
2. Enter your address
3. Browse our wide selection and choose your products
4. Place your order
5. Get your purchase delivered in 15 minutes

OUR SELECTION OF PRODUCTS

Have everything conveniently and easily delivered to your home: discover our selection of fresh fruits and vegetables, delicious snacks, and a variety of drinks for your after-work sundowner. We have red wine, we have white wine, and a wide selection of exciting beers.

Speaking of locals, we deliver bread from your favorite neighborhood bakery, salads & bowls from the young start-up next door, and meat from the traditional family-owned butchery in the surrounding area.

But what about your favorite brands? Maybe the name Häagen-Dazs can convince you. Or do you prefer Coca-Cola, M&M's, Haribo, Pringles, SAB, Unilever, and others? We have them all!

CONTACTLESS PAYMENT - CONTACTLESS DELIVERY
We deliver your shopping directly to your door. No supermarket crowds. No lugging. Secure, contactless, and convenient shopping.

15 MINUTE DELIVERY

We give you the time you would otherwise spend in the supermarket queue. Time to do yoga, hang up the laundry, play FIFA, take a power nap or do a power workout!
With our short delivery time, you'll just make it to put on the coffee or take out the trash before we're already ringing your doorbell.

PAYMENT METHODS
At Zulzi, you can pay easily and securely - by credit card, EFT payments, or Cash.

DELIVERING ON YOUR SCHEDULE

To fit your personal rhythm, we're here for you from 6:00 AM to 22:00pm. Always from Monday to Sunday, within 15 minutes

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

On the Just Eat app, you can order food – from pizza and sushi to burgers and kebabs – along with groceries, gifts, flowers and more, all delivered right to your door. With a wide selection of restaurants, supermarkets and local shops, you can enjoy whatever you want, wherever you are.

Top brand and local heroes
Order from big brands like McDonald's, Burger King, KFC, Pizza Hut, Domino’s, Wagamama, Starbucks, Greggs, Costa Coffee and even more local favourites. Explore menus with a variety of choices, including vegan and vegetarian options, to suit every craving.

Need groceries? Get them delivered.
Shop for essentials from top supermarkets like Sainsbury’s, Co-op, and Asda, or other local convenience stores. Whether you need fresh fruit, vegetables, snacks, flowers, alcohol, beauty products or household essentials, Just Eat has it all.


What can you do on the Just Eat app?
- Order food for delivery from restaurants, cafes, bakeries and more.
- Get groceries delivered to your door, including fresh produce, frozen food, drinks and everyday essentials.
- Order any time, whether it’s for breakfast, lunch, dinner or a late-night snack.
- Find lighter meal options, including poke bowls, salads, wraps, and sandwiches.
- Choose from many international cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Thai, Greek, Mexican, and Korean.
- Discover exclusive restaurant deals and discounts in the ‘Offers’ section.

Track or collect your order
Track your order in real-time with the Food Tracker® feature. You’ll receive push notifications about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries. Prefer collection? Simply choose the ‘collection’ option in the Just Eat app and pick up your order at your convenience.


Why Just Eat?
- Quick and hassle-free food delivery.
- Great offers and discounts.
- Choose to collect your order at the restaurant or store.
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, top-rated restaurants, nearby spots, and vegetarian/vegan/halal options.
- Get regular updates on your order with a handy Food Tracker®.
- Choose from multiple payment options.

With over 98,000+ restaurants, supermarkets and stores at your fingertips, Just Eat makes food and grocery delivery easier than ever.

Download the Just Eat app now and get what you love, delivered.

Mealime is a simple way for busy singles, couples, and families to plan their meals and eat healthier. Our meal plans & recipes are highly customizable so you can easily personalize a plan that works with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

Join over 5,000,000 people who have used our meal plans to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top benefits and features:

1. COOK HEALTHY MEALS IN ABOUT 30 MINUTES OR LESS
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked. 

2. NO MORE STRESSFUL "WHAT SHOULD I EAT?" DECISIONS TO MAKE
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. HEALTHY MEAL PLANS THAT ARE UNIQUELY YOUR OWN
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten free, dairy free, and a dozen more restrictions, and hundreds of individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. SUPER FAST GROCERY LIST & EFFORTLESS GROCERY DELIVERY
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your iPhone and shop in-store or get your grocery shopping done from your phone in minutes. Mealime works with most leading grocery retailers and we're always adding more!

5. SAVE MONEY WITH MINIMAL FOOD WASTE
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

With Mealime, your days of wasting food are over! All meal plans are intelligently created in order to eliminate food waste as much as possible, saving you hundreds of dollars per year.

6. KEEP TRACK OF YOUR NUTRITION GOALS
Every Mealime recipe lists comprehensive nutrition information so you can easily see what you're eating. Mealime integrates with the Health app so that you can easily see all of your health information in one place!

MEAL PLANNER PRO SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Mealime is free to download and use. Should you choose to upgrade to Mealime Meal Planner Pro, we offer two auto-renewing subscription options - one at a price of £2.99 / month.

These auto-renewing subscription plans renew automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. If on our monthly plan, the renewal price will be £2.99/month and will continue every month until cancelled.

Payment will be charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your iTunes account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in price when renewing.

Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal turned off by the user in Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term.

No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Privacy Policy
http://mealime.com/privacy-policy/

When you want pizza, you really want pizza. Luckily, our app is the quickest and easiest way to order one with a whole host of exclusive features. Want to know more? Course you do…


ORDER PIZZA

Scroll through our easy-order menu and treat yourself to an all-time classic or discover something new! You can even Create Your Own customised creation, give it a name and save it for next time. 


DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY

Whether you want to collect from your local store or have your pizza delivered to your door, our app’s got you covered. With stores up and down the country, you’re sure to find a Domino’s Pizza near you. 


EXCLUSIVE PIZZA DEALS

If deals are your thing, you’ve come to the right place (almost). Download our app and you’ll find dozens of exclusive pizza deals to suit any budget (and any occasion). You can even add your vouchers to bag discounts on your order!


GROUP ORDERING

If you need to order pizza for the whole fam, you can set up a group order to make ordering for the gang a doddle. Just send them an invite, let them choose what they want and it’ll get added to the order! 


PRE-ORDERING

If you know you want pizza later, but you’re ready to order now…no worries. Get your order in early, let us know when you want it, and we’ll do the rest. Oh, and if you know you want the same as last time, you can just choose it from your order history! 


PAYMENT

Oh, and when it comes to settling up, you can pay pretty much however you like…using card, PayPal or with just a few taps thanks to Apple Pay. Plus, you can keep an eye on your pizza’s progress with our trusty pizza tracker.
 

So, if you haven’t downloaded our app yet, you’re missing out on everything you love about Domino’s and so much more. 

Hit the link to download now and see it with your own eyes!

Shop Total is a shopping list app in which you can keep track of the total cost of all your shoppings. You can prepare the shopping lists at home and then in the store enter the amount (unit price) next to each item. The app calculates on the fly the total, even when multiple entries are set for the same item.

The pro version can be unlocked via an In App Purchase.
Pro features;
- Unlimited entries
- A clear button to clear all the check marks, units, promotions and prices in each shopping list, so you can reuse the list
- Two more app icons, dark mode and gold
- Calculator, use it without leaving the app

Advantages: 
- You can budget your shoppings, create multiple lists
- You can budget per shopping list, for even better control
- You can compare the bill from the store with what you have tracked
- You can see if the promotions are correctly billed (long press before the checkmark box to mark it)
- You can store the list in the photo roll, it has a date, so you can see later if items you buy regularly have increased in price. You can also sort the list before saving for better comparison with the real store receipt.
- In some stores you get discounts above a certain total or each x amount, now you can see in the store if you have reached this amount
- You can copy lists, so you don't have to retype so much
- You can see where you spent the most money on with, Where's my money?

Some budget tips;

You can give the main page title the name of the month and enter a global budget for this month. Then create shopping lists per store per week. For Example;

Walmart-week1
Walmart-week2
Walmart-week3
Walmart-week4

If you don't want to track the price of each article, you can still monitor your budget progress by giving the first item the total price of the receipt.
